causal_graph_nodes.description: scope=UI:/page; 提交 name=testXSS 后，返回错误消息：'Oops! You did an alert with TypeError: Attempting to change the setter of an unconfigurable property. instead of "XSS"'。表明输入被处理并尝试执行 alert，但因属性设置错误而失败。

data.error_message: Oops! You did an alert with TypeError: Attempting to change the setter of an unconfigurable property. instead of "XSS"
data.implication: Client-side XSS filter/sandbox present, payload execution attempted but failed due to syntax/property error.

causal_graph_nodes.description: scope=UI:/page; 参数 name=testXSS 被反射为 value="testXSS"，同时返回错误消息：'Oops! You did an alert with TypeError: Attempting to change the setter of an unconfigurable property. instead of "XSS"'。

data.error_message: Oops! You did an alert with TypeError: Attempting to change the setter of an unconfigurable property. instead of "XSS"

causal_graph_nodes.description: 目标服务器运行在 Werkzeug/1.0.1 (Python 2.7.18) 上。
应用包含两个主要端点：主页 (/) 和 /page。
/page 页面包含一个表单，其中有一个名为 `name` 的文本输入字段，其值通过查询参数反射并可控。
向 `name` 参数提交测试值会触发特定的客户端JavaScript错误，表明存在某种执行环境或过滤器。
